text: Chézy may refer to: ; People * Antoine de Chézy (1718–1798), French hydraulic engineer * Antoine-Léonard de Chézy (1773–1832), French orientalist * Helmina von Chézy (1783–1856), German journalist, poet and playwright ; Communes in France * Chézy, Allier, in the Allier department * Chézy-en-Orxois, in the Aisne department * Chézy-sur-Marne, in the Aisne department ; Other * Chézy formula, for river flows
title: Chézy
